price: Ni jedhu: “faaruun kan Rabbii gadda nurraa deemsiseeti. Gooftaan keenya araaramaa, galateeffataadha.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqālū al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī adhhaba ʿannā al-ḥazana inna rabbanā laghafūrun shakūrun
